page.title: 12MRS. HISCOCK'S DAY
page.content:
I WAKE AT 6.30am AND RISE AT 6.45. AFTER GETTING DRESSED, I JUST HAVE A CUP OF TEA WHILE THE REST OF THE FAMILY HAVE TOAST AND CEREAL.
I LEAVE FOR WORK AT 7.35am AND MY HUSBAND TAKES THE CHILDREN TO THE CHILD MINDER WHEN HE LEAVES AY 8.00am. AT 8.00am I START WORK ON A COMPUTER-LINKED V.D.U. I FINISH WORK AT 12.00
ON THE WAY HOME I GET ANY SHOPPING I NEED AND THE AFTERNOON IS SPENT WASHING, CLEANING THE HOUSE AND COOKING THE DINNER.
IF I HAVE TIME IN THE EVENING I WATCH T.V. OR READ A BOOK. SOME EVENINGS I BABYSIT FOR A FRIEND. BY 10.30pm I AM USUALLY SO TIRED THAT I GO TO BED.
